707340f-a.text:
245-255 Weirfield Street, north side, at, adjoining and east of Wilson Ave. In the foreground, are the trolley tracks of the Wilson Ave., trolley
lines. Also seen is the Irving Square Presbyterian Church.
March 29, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
707340f-a.folder: Weirfield St. & Wilson Ave., Brooklyn, NY
